channel.title: Posts on NJ11 for Palestine

item.title: Advocacy Actions for Peace
item.description: Remember, every call, email, and message counts. Your advocacy is a step towards change, pushing for peace, justice, and respect for human rights. Engage, inform, and encourage others in your community to participate. Together, our voices can lead to meaningful policy changes and a brighter future for all affected by this conflict. View our daily actions page and check out the Actions category for more ideas. If you have an ideas please contect us via this form.
